spa_services.title: Swedish Massage
spa_services.description: A classic full-body massage that promotes relaxation and improves circulation. Uses long, flowing strokes to release tension and stress.
spa_services.preparation: Arrive 15 minutes early. Avoid heavy meals 2 hours before treatment. Stay hydrated.

spa_services.title: Deep Tissue Massage
spa_services.description: Therapeutic massage targeting deeper muscle layers and connective tissue. Ideal for chronic pain, muscle knots, and tension.
spa_services.preparation: Drink plenty of water before and after. Communicate pain levels during treatment.

spa_services.title: Hot Stone Massage
spa_services.description: Relaxing massage using heated basalt stones to warm muscles and enhance the therapeutic experience.
spa_services.preparation: Inform therapist of heat sensitivity. Avoid alcohol before treatment.

spa_services.title: Signature Hydrating Facial
spa_services.description: Customized facial treatment designed to cleanse, exfoliate, and hydrate your skin for a radiant glow.
spa_services.preparation: Avoid sun exposure 24 hours before. Remove makeup and contact lenses.

spa_services.title: Anti-Aging Facial
spa_services.description: Advanced facial treatment targeting signs of aging with specialized serums and techniques.
spa_services.preparation: Discontinue retinoids 3 days before. Avoid sun exposure.

spa_services.title: Full Body Scrub
spa_services.description: Exfoliating treatment that removes dead skin cells and leaves skin smooth and radiant.
spa_services.preparation: Avoid shaving 24 hours before. Shower without oils or lotions.

spa_services.title: Detox Body Wrap
spa_services.description: Purifying treatment that helps eliminate toxins and reduce bloating while nourishing the skin.
spa_services.preparation: Drink plenty of water. Avoid eating 2 hours before treatment.

spa_services.title: Aromatherapy Session
spa_services.description: Therapeutic use of essential oils to promote physical and emotional well-being through inhalation and topical application.
spa_services.preparation: Inform therapist of any allergies. Avoid strong fragrances before treatment.

spa_services.title: Meditation and Mindfulness Session
spa_services.description: Guided meditation and mindfulness practice to promote mental well-being and stress reduction.
spa_services.preparation: Wear comfortable clothing. Arrive with an open mind.
contraindications: Severe mental health conditions (consult doctor first)

spa_policies.title: Booking Policy
spa_policies.content: All appointments must be booked at least 24 hours in advance. We require a valid credit card to secure your reservation. Same-day bookings are subject to availability.

spa_policies.title: Cancellation Policy
spa_policies.content: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your appointment to avoid a 50% cancellation fee. No-shows will be charged the full treatment price.

spa_policies.title: Rescheduling Policy
spa_policies.content: Appointments can be rescheduled up to 12 hours before the scheduled time. Same-day rescheduling is subject to availability and may incur additional fees.

spa_policies.title: Arrival Time
spa_policies.content: Please arrive 15 minutes before your scheduled appointment for check-in and preparation. Late arrivals may result in shortened treatment time.

spa_policies.title: Dress Code
spa_policies.content: Comfortable, loose-fitting clothing is recommended. We provide robes and slippers for your comfort. Please remove jewelry before treatments.

spa_policies.title: Health Conditions
spa_policies.content: Please inform us of any health conditions, allergies, or medications before your treatment. Some treatments may not be suitable for certain conditions.

spa_policies.title: Pregnancy Policy
spa_policies.content: We offer specialized treatments for pregnant guests. Please inform us of your pregnancy when booking. Some treatments are not recommended during pregnancy.

spa_facilities.title: Zen Garden
spa_facilities.description: Peaceful outdoor space with meditation areas, water features, and comfortable seating for pre and post-treatment relaxation.

spa_facilities.title: Quiet Lounge
spa_facilities.description: Indoor relaxation space with comfortable seating, soft lighting, and calming music. Complimentary herbal teas available.

spa_facilities.title: Steam Room
spa_facilities.description: Traditional steam room for detoxification and relaxation. Helps open pores and improve circulation.

spa_facilities.title: Sauna
spa_facilities.description: Dry heat sauna for muscle relaxation and stress relief. Temperature controlled for optimal comfort.

spa_facilities.title: Vitality Pool
spa_facilities.description: Heated pool with jets for hydrotherapy and muscle relaxation. Perfect for post-treatment recovery.

spa_packages.title: Relaxation Retreat
spa_packages.description: Complete relaxation package including Swedish massage, hydrating facial, and access to wellness facilities.

spa_packages.title: Couples Retreat
spa_packages.description: Romantic spa experience for two including side-by-side treatments and private relaxation time.

spa_packages.title: Detox and Renewal
spa_packages.description: Comprehensive detox program combining body treatments, wellness facilities, and nutrition guidance.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What should I wear to my spa appointment?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Wear comfortable, loose-fitting clothing. We provide robes, slippers, and disposable undergarments for your comfort. Please remove jewelry before treatments.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How early should I arrive for my appointment?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Please arrive 15 minutes before your scheduled appointment time. This allows time for check-in, consultation, and preparation.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I book same-day appointments?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Same-day bookings are subject to availability. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to ensure your preferred time slot.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is your cancellation policy?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your appointment to avoid a 50% cancellation fee. No-shows will be charged the full treatment price.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Are treatments suitable during pregnancy?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We offer specialized treatments for pregnant guests. Please inform us of your pregnancy when booking as some treatments are not recommended during pregnancy.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What if I have allergies or health conditions?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Please inform us of any health conditions, allergies, or medications when booking. Our therapists will customize treatments to ensure your safety and comfort.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What wellness facilities are available?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We offer a steam room, sauna, vitality pool, zen garden, and quiet lounge. Access to facilities can be booked separately or included in treatment packages.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do you provide refreshments?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Complimentary herbal teas are available in our relaxation areas. Fresh fruit water is also provided. Full meal service is available with advance notice.

spa_tips_and_advice.title: Hydration is Key
spa_tips_and_advice.content: Drink plenty of water before and after your treatments. Proper hydration enhances the benefits of spa treatments and helps eliminate toxins.

spa_tips_and_advice.title: Avoid Heavy Meals
spa_tips_and_advice.content: Avoid eating heavy meals 2 hours before your treatment. Light snacks are fine, but heavy meals can cause discomfort during treatments.

spa_tips_and_advice.title: Take It Easy
spa_tips_and_advice.content: Plan to relax after your treatment. Avoid strenuous activities and give your body time to fully absorb the benefits of your spa experience.

spa_tips_and_advice.title: Continue Hydrating
spa_tips_and_advice.content: Continue drinking water after your treatment to help flush out toxins and maintain the benefits of your spa experience.

spa_tips_and_advice.title: Regular Self-Care
spa_tips_and_advice.content: Regular spa treatments can be part of a healthy lifestyle. Consider monthly treatments to maintain stress levels and overall well-being.

spa_tips_and_advice.title: Communicate Your Needs
spa_tips_and_advice.content: Always communicate with your therapist about pressure, temperature, and any discomfort. Treatments should be enjoyable and relaxing.
